meta.title: David Firman - Psychologist, Pastor & Author
meta.description: Discover books, courses and services by David Firman focused on the whole being, family and God's purpose.

hero.text: We work to understand and live out the eternal designs of the whole being (spirit, soul and body), marriage, and family—recovered by God’s wisdom on the cross, where the New Covenant allows us to rewrite our story and enjoy Christ as real life.

about.title: About Me
description: I'm Argentine, I’ve been married to Denise Martínez since 1999. Father to Elías and Ana Paula.
A clinical psychologist since 1998, specialized in Systemic Family Therapy.
I hold a Bachelor’s Degree in Theology and serve as Pastor at “Todo Nuevo en Cristo.”
I’m a passionate author of books about the whole being, courtship, marriage, and family. I greatly enjoy giving international conferences that build up families and the Church.

items.title: Psychotherapeutic Consultations
items.text: With over 28 years of clinical experience, I work on conflict resolution or brief therapy, considering the whole being: spirit, soul, and body.

items.title: Mental Health Professional Training
items.text: We work to break free from the kidnapping of humanism by understanding God's eternal wisdom to truly address human problems. Recorded material and live Zoom sessions.

items.title: Clinical Case Supervision
items.text: Live Zoom sessions where I offer my experience to support and guide professionals with their cases.

courses.title: Courses
courses.intro: Courses aimed at pastors, leaders, mental health professionals, and anyone desiring to know and live God’s eternal designs.

items.title: The Psychology of God
items.text: This course explores how the mind, will, and emotions (soul) are part of God’s design for the whole being and what God’s purpose is for the human soul.

items.title: Families Aligned with the Eternal
items.text: Discover God’s original design and intentions and learn how to incorporate them into your family.

items.title: How to Face Adversity
items.text: This course addresses a key topic: pain, tragedy, suffering, death, and grief, offering tools to face them.

items.title: How We Save the Family
items.text: One of the great questions of recent generations attacked by anti-design ideologies.

church.title: Church Master Builder
church.text: We understand the Gospel is not static teaching, definitions, or concepts to be learned, but a divine nature imparted to us in Christ through the new birth—not so we act like Christ, but so that He acts in us. That’s why we work in gatherings that serve the Bread of Life, who is Christ, for the training of that nature in men and women who, responding to God's interest and cause, activate that purposeful life. This will lead them to become tools in God’s hands to redeem their generation for His glory, producing the increase of Christ on the earth.

books.title: Books
books.intro: As a service, we work to provide families and the Church with materials of deep edification—some available as free PDFs and others in printed form via Editorial Peniel & Editorial Rica.
